com.dua3.meja.model

Interface Workbook

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericWorkbook, PoiWorkbook

    public interface Workbook
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Workbook class. A workbook consists of different sheets which can be accessed by number or name.
